foodninjafreemode.round_success: You won this round! Proceeding to the next round...

foodquiz.congrats_text: Every step you take is a chance to learn and grow, and today you took another positive stride toward understanding healthy foods, habits, and nutrients. Remember, progress isn't just about perfection—it's about trying, exploring, and gaining knowledge that fuels your journey toward a healthier lifestyle. Keep up the curiosity and determination, because every effort brings you closer to a stronger, healthier you!

foodquiz.no_available_helps: Looks like there’s no help available right now, but don’t worry—you’ve got this! I believe in you!
